DOC.brief_title: 3-D Endoanal Ultrasound : Normative Anatomy Anal Sphincter Nulliparous Females
DOC.detailed_description: Participants ask complete one page questionnaire . This questionnaire address whether perineal trauma , sphincter laceration , anal incontinence , fecal urgency impact subject level . Subjects also ask bowel habit history problem bowel movement . Subjects ask undergo ultrasound study anal sphincter time enrollment . Completing entire study take 15 minute . This do doctor 's office . Answering questionnaire take 5 minute . The endoanal ultrasound probe diameter equivalent index finger . It insert rectum measure length width sphincter muscle .
DOC.criteria: nulliparous woman age 18. history anal incontinence , chronic constipation , anorectal disease trauma , neuromuscular neuropsychiatric disease , diabetes , gastrointestinal disorder , previous anorectal pelvic surgery .
